unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali a Headache!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali a Headache!**

unnormalised: Looks like your Diwali diya budget might be taking a hit this year. That pesky gas cylinder price is up again, folks! Sources whisper a Rs. 50 hike per cylinder, leaving many kitchens feeling the pinch.
normalised: Looks like your Diwali diya budget might be taking a hit this year. That pesky gas cylinder price is up again, folks! Sources whisper a rupee fifty hike per cylinder, leaving many kitchens feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: Remember Amma scolding you for using too much gas while making biryani? Well, that's about to become a common scene!
normalised: Remember Amma scolding you for using too much gas while making biryani? Well, that is about to become a common scene!

unnormalised: “It's impacting the monthly budget of so many families, especially with festivals around the corner,” says Lakshmi from Chennai, a worried homemaker. “Diwali sweets need gas, you know!”
normalised: “It is impacting the monthly budget of so many families, especially with festivals around the corner,” says Lakshmi from Chennai, a worried homemaker. “Diwali sweets need gas, you know!”

unnormalised: Distributors are mumbling something about global crude oil prices and the usual dollar-rupee drama. The Petroleum Ministry hasn't issued any official statement yet, but folks on Twitter are already trending #GasPriceHike.
normalised: Distributors are mumbling something about global crude oil prices and the usual dollar-rupee drama. The Petroleum Ministry has not issued any official statement yet, but folks on Twitter are already trending hash Gas Price Hike.

unnormalised: Experts at the Indian Oil Corporation (IOC) hinted at “necessary adjustments” but didn’t give a concrete number.
normalised: Experts at the I O C hinted at “necessary adjustments” but did not give a concrete number.

unnormalised: So, maybe it's time to dust off those old recipes that require less cooking, or plan a potluck. Every little bit helps, right? Looks like this Diwali, we might all be eating a little less, courtesy of the gas price gods.
normalised: So, maybe it is time to dust off those old recipes that require less cooking, or plan a potluck. Every little bit helps, right? Looks like this Diwali, we might all be eating a little less, courtesy of the gas price gods.
